_header: All the world shall be there ready
Note: Possibly a fragment of a longer work.
_description: Prophecy of sinners being accused by fellow men and by God — four couplets

TCD158.First Lines:
All þe warlde sall be þere redyto acuse þe synfull
                    manne opinly…
TCD158.Last Lines:
…And namely þo synnes þai sall ham sayto while
                    þat eggyde ham nyght & day
TCD158.Note:
Introduced by lead-in, ‘And all þe elementis þat hus
                    gouernes’ (f. 88); several copies of four couplets on same
                    page.
